info.title: Commercial Project - Read
info.description: The service provides header and detail-level information about customer and internal projects. It can be used as a data provider to integrate third-party tools or applications for business processes such as resource management, staffing, or time recording.

x-sap-shortText: Enable external applications to read commercial project information from your SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Internal Project Management - Project-Based Services(1A8)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1A8 " Link To BP ")
[Customer Project Management - Project-Based Services(J11)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/J11 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Engagement Project (/CPD/CUSTOMER_PROJECT)
* Work Package (/CPD/CUST_PROJ_WORKPACKAGE)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Returns details about customer and internal projects.
get.description: Returns details about all customer and internal projects in the system. Besides retrieving basic information, it also retrieves information such as business partners assigned to project roles, the work packages and resources planned in a project,and staffing assignments.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns details about a customer or internal project.
get.description: Returns details about a customer or internal project. Using the project ID, you can retrieve information such as business partners assigned to project roles, the work packages and resources planned in a project, and staffing assignments.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns, for a project, the project roles and the business partners assigned to those roles.
get.description: Retrieves all the project roles and the business partner assigned to each role, for a given customer or internal project.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns the work packages and its details, for a given customer or internal project.
get.description: Returns the work packages and corresponding details, for a given customer or internal project. Besides retrieving details about a work package, it also retrieves information from related entities such as work package functions, work items, planned resources, and staffed resources.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns information about work packages in customer and internal projects.
get.description: Returns information such as the work package name, work package type, start and end dates, assigned work items, the resource plan, work package functions and their status, and when it was last changed.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns information for one work package in a customer or internal project.
get.description: Returns information for one work package in a project. You can retrieve details such as the work package name, work package type, start and end  dates, assigned work items, the resource plan work package functions and their status, and when it was last changed.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns a list of work package functions and their status, for a given work package.
get.description: Returns, for a given work package, a list of work package functions and whether each work package function is blocked or allowed.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

get.summary: Returns the list of work items assigned to a work package.
get.description: Returns the list of work items assigned to a work package, and whether a work item is active or inactive in the context of the work package.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns details about a work package and a list of resource types and resources planned in a work package.
get.description: Returns details about a work package and a list of resource types and resources planned in a work package. The resource types could be people, additional resources, and expenses. It also retrieves information about staffing in the work package.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns information about resources and expenses planned in work packages of customer and internal projects.
get.description: Returns information about resources and expenses planned in work packages.' It also retrieves details such as the project ID, work package ID and name, the version of the plan, and the quantity or expense planned in different months of the workpackage.' If staffing exists, it also retrieves information about persons staffed to the plan, the delivery organization they come from, and if the staffing assignment is confirmed.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns detailed information about a resource or expense planned in a work package.
get.description: Returns details about a resource or expense planned in a work package. Using the available keys, you can retrieve information about the quantity distribution between months. If there are several records with identical information in key fields, then the response is a set of aggregated records with planned efforts   quantities, or amounts grouped by a list of predefined criteria such as resource type, resource, calendar year, calendar month,    billing control category, work item, Employee ID, and so on.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns information about staffing for a specific resource type.
get.description: Returns information about staffing for resource type 0ACT only. It retrieves information such as the name of the person, the staffed effort and the corresponding month, the work item, whether the staffing is confirmed, and if the efforts are billable or not.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns the work items assigned to a work package and the status of the work item.
get.description: Returns the work items assigned to a work package. It also retrieves information such as the work package ID, work item ID, description, and whether the work item is active or inactive.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns information about a work item in a work package.
get.description: Returns information about a work item in a work package. It also retrieves information such as the name of the work item and whether the work item is active or inactive.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns the project roles and business partners assigned to them.
get.description: Returns details about the roles assigned to a project and the business partner assigned to each role.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns the business partner assigned to a project role.
get.description: Returns the business partner assigned to a project role. It retrieves information such as the ID and name of the business partner.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns information about staffing in work packages of a customer or internal project.
get.description: Returns information about staffing in work packages. It retrieves information such as the work package ID, the personnel number, the delivery organization, the number of hours planned in each month, and whether the staffing is confirmed.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns details about staffing for planned activities in a work package.
get.description: Returns details about staffing for planned activities in a work package. It retrieves details such as the delivery organization, the personnel number, the number of hours staffed in each month, the work items assigned to the individual,and whether the staffing is confirmed. If there are several records with identical information in key fields, then the response is a set of aggregated records with planned efforts   quantities, or amounts grouped by a list of predefined criteria such as resource type, resource, calendar year, calendar month,    billing control category, work item, Employee ID, and so on.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns the work package functions in work packages of customer and internal projects.
get.description: Returns information about work package functions in a work package. It also retrieves information such as the work package ID, project ID, workpackage function, its description, and whether the work package function is blocked or allowed in the work package.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Returns information about a work package function in the work package of a customer or internal project.
get.description: Returns information about a work package function in a work package. It retrieves information such as the work package function name and whether it is blocked or allowed.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET ProjectSet HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
